alert.note: Alert for Lee; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 2:34PM EDT until April 06 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN LEE AND NORTHEASTERN TERRELL COUNTIES... At 234 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dawson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Smithville, Sasser, Bronwood, Chokee, Bridges Crossroad, Jordan Place, Starksville, Scrutchins, Oakville, Olivers Mill, Neyami and Yeomans. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
